        public void addItem​(Product product,
                    int quantity)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: ShoppingBasket
        Add a product to this ShoppingBasket. Will combine and sum duplicate item counts if encountered.
        Specified by:
        addItem in interface ShoppingBasket
        Parameters:
        product - - The product to add. May not be null.
        quantity - - The number of units of the product to add. Must be 1 or more.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached.

      • removeItem

        public boolean removeItem​(Product product,
                          int quantity)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: ShoppingBasket
        Removes a product from this ShoppingBasket if and only if the given count or more was contained in the ShoppingBasket. If this brings the total count of that product to 0 the product entry is removed entirely.
        Specified by:
        removeItem in interface ShoppingBasket
        Parameters:
        product - - The product to remove. May not be null.
        quantity - - The number of units of the product to remove. Must be 1 or more.
        Returns:
        True if the given count of more of the given product were contained in the ShoppingBasket and thus removed. Otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if any of the parameter preconditions were breached.

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<Product,​java.lang.Integer>> getItems()
        Description copied from interface: ShoppingBasket
        Retrieves a list of each Product and count of units currently contained by this ShoppingBasket.
        Specified by:
        getItems in interface ShoppingBasket
        Returns:
        The list of Products and count of units by Pair. Minimum count per product is 1.
